name: European Union (Framework)
scope_notes: Prototype compliance mapping only. High-level EU framework references; jurisdiction- and fact-specific analysis required. Always verify with qualified counsel.
marketing_notes: Cross-border marketing rules vary by investor type and member state implementation.
Treat any public/retail communication as counsel-gated.
licensing_notes: Manager authorization/registration and delegation rules are fact-specific and must be confirmed.
tokenization_notes: Any tokenized fund interest requires a separate securities/market infrastructure analysis.
crypto_financing_notes: Crypto-related financing and custody may trigger additional EU and national regimes.
